mapper.select: select i.content_id as content_id, i.content_type_id as content_type_id, d.cat3 as cat3, i.title as title, i.addr1 as addr1, i.latitude as latitude, i.longitude as longitude, i.first_image as first_image, i.first_image2 as first_image2, d.cat1 as cat1, d.cat2 as cat2 from ( select * from attraction_info where latitude = #{latitude} and longitude = #{longitude} ) i join attraction_detail d on i.content_id = d.content_id
select s.sido_code as sido_code, sido_name, gugun_code, gugun_name from sido s join gugun g on s.sido_code = g.sido_code order by sido_code, gugun_code
